post.body: Sounds good. Great seeing you two last night. Have a safe drive and happy new year!
Too bad the drinks don't start flowing until I board. And now, we don't have a gate agent. Fortunately I found an outlet.
I just had some A&W. Still no idea when my flight is going to leave.
We can do whatever you. Rob will aleady be downtown at the Rusted Root concert. He wants us to call him when we're done.
Things are going well. I'm at the airport waiting for my flight to take me back to the 312. How are things with you?
Awesome! I'll have to try it sometime. Another good place is the Coco Paso (sp?) Cafe.
Weather in general is all wacky. Maybe somebody is using one of those weather altering machines from Superman 3.
Can't wait to hear what you think and to dine on a 45 day aged ribeye and cheesecake lollipops.
I have not, but heard good things. Great wine selection.
Yep. Instead of driving, I'm now flying back Saturday. I got first class too. Thank you NWA elite status.
Damn girl. You kiss your mom with that mouth?
I figured it out. It's so AAA can raise car insurance rates.
There's something wrong with me. I went to bed 4hrs ago and am ready to start partying again up in Wrigleyville. BTW, no hangover.
Is on the ground waiting for the gate to clear. Fortunately my buzz is still going.
Finally boarded. Hopefully the weather will allow us to take off.
#boarding DTW
Heading to the B concourse bar at DTW. Gotta do something to pass the time of an airport delay.
Merry Christmas everybody.
Is in Detroit after a nearly 7hr adventure.
